nodes.text: A Sith Temple stood in the forests of Krant during the Clone Wars. Unlike in other parts of the forest, the ground around the temple wasn't covered with grass and the nearby trees were withered.

The temple is located far from the main battlefront and is covered by the forest from all sides. It can be reached only if the player destroys a large amount of trees with their artillery. Whether the temple grounds were created as an Easter egg or an intended feature is unknown. The temple is listed as a part of the Confederacy faction during the mission.
